label: orientation
text: prefers not to label it (and doesn't experience attraction very often anyway), but empirically has most often been attracted to male-presenting people

label: race/ethnicity
text: white American; background is 50% Russian, 25% Italian, 25% Eastern European Ashkenazi variety pack

label: family
text: raised mostly by his dad Joseph; mother Susanna died when he was in elementary school; has a would-be third parent Christopher who he may or may not know about

label: other relationships
text: in high school, Jason becomes his first boyfriend; in most timelines they break up around graduation, but may get back together some years later. in most timelines, dates Jackie during college, which may become a long-term relationship with them living together.

label: location
text: mostly Columbus, OH; in some timelines moves to Pittsburgh, PA to live with Jason and/or Soo Jin

label: build
text: gangly and waifish, but broad; wide shoulders and large hands and slender fingers

label: voice
text: soft, but not necessarily gentle; dry; often sarcastic

label: manner
text: quiet and unassuming; easily fades into the background; often lethargic

label: interests
text: video games, TTRPGs, reading, sewing, programming, cooking, maybe other fiber arts?
